Name: Battlestage
About the game: Battlestage - co-op Twin Stick Shooter - singleplayer campaign and survival mode - up to four players muliplayer mode (online and local) - play the campaign in co-op mode or survive in the survival mode - play the survival mode with tower defense elements - millions of possible weapon variations - many skills and gadgets - over 40 different enemy types - level up system - different side quests - achievments - online Leaderboards
Meta Title: Battlestage: Sep 11, 2020, FZ-Tech and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Battlestage? Check out the release date (Sep 11, 2020), developer insights from FZ-Tech, and a complete game summary.
